mapper.select: /* 대국민포털_DUR수유부주의기본 조회 (DurNurswMapper.getDurNursw) */ SELECT nursw_cutn_sn ,prdct_cd ,main_igrd_cd ,igrd_nm ,prdct_nm ,bzenty_nm ,mfds_prdct_nm ,mfds_igrd_cd ,mfds_igrd_nm ,pbanc_ymd ,pbanc_no ,aplcn_ym ,rmrk ,type_cd ,rgtr_id ,reg_dt ,reg_prgrm_id ,mdfr_id ,mdfcn_dt ,mdfcn_prgrm_id FROM "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_DUR_NURSW" WHERE 1=1 AND nursw_cutn_sn = #{nurswCutnSn}
mapper.update: /* 대국민포털_DUR수유부주의기본 수정 (DurNurswMapper.updateDurNursw) */ UPDATE "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_DUR_NURSW" SET prdct_cd = coalesce(#{prdctCd}, prdct_cd) ,main_igrd_cd = coalesce(#{mainIgrdCd}, main_igrd_cd) ,igrd_nm = coalesce(#{igrdNm}, igrd_nm) ,prdct_nm = coalesce(#{prdctNm}, prdct_nm) ,bzenty_nm = coalesce(#{bzentyNm}, bzenty_nm) ,mfds_prdct_nm = coalesce(#{mfdsPrdctNm}, mfds_prdct_nm) ,mfds_igrd_cd = coalesce(#{mfdsIgrdCd}, mfds_igrd_cd) ,mfds_igrd_nm = coalesce(#{mfdsIgrdNm}, mfds_igrd_nm) ,pbanc_ymd = coalesce(#{pbancYmd}, pbanc_ymd) ,pbanc_no = coalesce(#{pbancNo}, pbanc_no) ,aplcn_ym = coalesce(#{aplcnYm}, aplcn_ym) ,rmrk = coalesce(#{rmrk}, rmrk) ,type_cd = coalesce(#{typeCd}, type_cd) ,mdfr_id = coalesce(#{mdfrId}, mdfr_id) ,mdfcn_dt = now() ,mdfcn_prgrm_id = coalesce(#{mdfcnPrgrmId}, mdfcn_prgrm_id) WHERE 1=1 AND nursw_cutn_sn = #{nurswCutnSn}
